    1. Constants()

Class Constants

java.lang.Object
pm.util.Constants
public final class Constants extends Object
Global constants for the ProjectManager application. This class centralizes all constant values used in the project: - File paths and configuration directories - Default commands for different project types - File names for project type detection The class is final and has a private constructor to prevent instantiation (utility class pattern).
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
SoftDryzz

  • Field Details

    • VERSION

      public static final String VERSION
      Current version of ProjectManager. Follows Semantic Versioning (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • HOME

      public static final Path HOME
      Home directory of the current user. Obtained from the system property "user.home". Examples: - Linux/Mac: /home/user or /Users/user - Windows: C:\Users\ user

    • CONFIG_DIR

      public static final Path CONFIG_DIR
      Configuration directory for ProjectManager. Created at: ~/.projectmanager/ Stored here: - projects.json (list of registered projects) - cache/ (scan cache) - logs/ (execution logs)

    • PROJECTS_FILE

      public static final Path PROJECTS_FILE
      JSON file containing the list of registered projects. Path: ~/.projectmanager/projects.json File structure: { "backend-api": { "name": "backend-api", "path": "/home/user/projects/backend-api", "type": "MAVEN", "commands": { "build": "mvn package", "run": "mvn exec:java" }, "envVars": { "PORT": "8080", "DEBUG": "true" } } }

    • CACHE_DIR

      public static final Path CACHE_DIR
      Cache directory to store scanning results. Path: ~/.projectmanager/cache/ Used to avoid re-scanning large projects.

    • BUILD_GRADLE

      public static final String BUILD_GRADLE
      Default command to compile Gradle projects. Executes all build tasks and generates the JAR.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • RUN_GRADLE

      public static final String RUN_GRADLE
      Default command to run Gradle projects. Uses the "run" task defined in build.gradle.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TEST_GRADLE

      public static final String TEST_GRADLE
      Default command to run tests in Gradle projects. Executes all tests using JUnit.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CLEAN_GRADLE

      public static final String CLEAN_GRADLE
      Command to clean generated files in Gradle projects. Deletes the build/ directory.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BUILD_MAVEN

      public static final String BUILD_MAVEN
      Default command to compile Maven projects. Executes phases: compile, test, package.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • RUN_MAVEN

      public static final String RUN_MAVEN
      Default command to run Maven projects. Uses the exec-maven-plugin. Requires configuration in pom.xml.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TEST_MAVEN

      public static final String TEST_MAVEN
      Default command to run tests in Maven projects. Executes the test phase (JUnit/TestNG).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CLEAN_MAVEN

      public static final String CLEAN_MAVEN
      Command to clean generated files in Maven projects. Deletes the target/ directory.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BUILD_NPM

      public static final String BUILD_NPM
      Default command to compile Node.js projects. Executes the "build" script defined in package.json.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • RUN_NPM

      public static final String RUN_NPM
      Default command to run Node.js projects. Executes the "start" script defined in package.json.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TEST_NPM

      public static final String TEST_NPM
      Default command to run tests in Node.js projects. Executes the "test" script (typically Jest, Mocha, etc.).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BUILD_DOTNET

      public static final String BUILD_DOTNET
      Default command to compile .NET projects (C#/F#). Compiles the project and generates DLL/EXE.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • RUN_DOTNET

      public static final String RUN_DOTNET
      Default command to run .NET projects. Runs the compiled application.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TEST_DOTNET

      public static final String TEST_DOTNET
      Default command to run tests in .NET projects. Uses xUnit, NUnit, or MSTest.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FILE_BUILD_GRADLE

      public static final String FILE_BUILD_GRADLE
      Gradle configuration file name. If this file exists in the project root, it is a Gradle project.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FILE_BUILD_GRADLE_KTS

      public static final String FILE_BUILD_GRADLE_KTS
      Gradle configuration file name using Kotlin DSL. Alternative to build.gradle using Kotlin syntax.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FILE_POM_XML

      public static final String FILE_POM_XML
      Maven configuration file name. If this file exists in the project root, it is a Maven project.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FILE_PACKAGE_JSON

      public static final String FILE_PACKAGE_JSON
      Node.js configuration file name. Contains npm project metadata and scripts.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FILE_CSPROJ

      public static final String FILE_CSPROJ
      Extension for .NET project files. Examples: MyApp.csproj, MyLib.fsproj
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FILE_REQUIREMENTS_TXT

      public static final String FILE_REQUIREMENTS_TXT
      Python dependency file. Contains the list of required pip packages.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Constants

      private Constants()
      Private constructor to prevent instantiation. This class only contains static constants.
      Throws:
      AssertionError - always, to indicate that it should not be instantiated
